Control Name: CM-8 (9) ASSIGNMENT OF COMPONENTS TO SYSTEMS
Control Statement: The organization: (a) Assigns [Assignment: organization-defined acquired information system components] to an information system; and (b) Receives an acknowledgement from the information system owner of this assignment.
